A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is not my Luke Skywalker. No consistency between The Force Awakens and The Last Jedi. It’s as if both directors wanted to do their own thing at the expense of the story and characters. Too many plot holes and pointless adventures for Characters just to get them in the movie. If you are looking for any answers to questions from TFA don’t set your expectations too high. Good Luck to JJ On Ep 9 Rian Johnson handed you a hot potato.
